plot outline: Kamli (Sangita) loses her bag in the railway station. Later, her bag is sent to her home, along with a letter from Surya (V. Ravichandran), who found it. Kamli and Surya send letters to each other and soon fall in love. Yaare Neenu Cheluve is the remake of a Tamil blockbuster Kadhal Kottai.
title: Yaare Neenu Cheluve
plot: Kamli (Sangita) loses her bag in the railway station. Later, her bag is sent to her home, along with a letter from Surya (V. Ravichandran), who found it. Kamli and Surya send letters to each other and soon fall in love. _Yaare Neenu Cheluve_ (qv) is the remake of a Tamil blockbuster Kadhal Kottai.
